Search Results for

    Show / Hide Table of Contents

    Namespace Vivarium.Config

    Classes

    AgentConfig

    Mutable agent configuration. These values can be tweaked at runtime to balance agent behavior without restarting the simulation.

    BrainAIConfig

    Mutable brain/AI configuration. These values can be tweaked at runtime to balance neural network behavior and instincts.

    ConfigProvider

    Provides global access to the current simulation configuration. The configuration is set once at startup and the mutable sections can be modified at runtime for live balancing.

    GeneticsConfig

    Genetics configuration. GenomeLength and TraitGeneCount are immutable as they affect array sizes. MutationRate can be tweaked at runtime.

    PlantConfig

    Mutable plant configuration. These values can be tweaked at runtime to balance plant behavior without restarting the simulation.

    SimulationConfig

    Root configuration container for the entire simulation. Combines immutable world settings with mutable balance parameters.

    WorldConfig

    Immutable world configuration. These values affect array sizes and data structures, so they cannot be changed after simulation initialization.
